li.a: The Flu - A Guide for Parents
The Flu - A Guide for Parents

article.p: Welcome to Paramus Public Schools. Our district serves students in preschool through high school across eight campuses in Paramus, New Jersey.

div.p: Please take some time to learn more about our district, our schools, and the dedicated professionals who take pride in helping our students become lifelong learners. Please contact us if you have any questions.
School counselor Mrs. Corizzo organized a message of hope to welcome students back from spring break and into week four of distance learning.

a.aria-label: Read more about Message of Hope

div.p: Dance New Jersey recently selected PHS dancer Isabella Verma as the recipient of the 2020 NJ Governor's Award for Excellence in Artistry & Leadership in Dance.

a.aria-label: Read more about Congratulations Isabella Verma

div.p: Bergen Magazine is featuring Paramus's very own middle school librarian and media specialist Emily Skrezec, about the current state of her podcast, Amongst the Books, and how she is staying connected with the students.
Congratulations to Paramus Public Schools! Once again, we have been selected as a "2020 Best Community in Music" in the nation for music education by the NAMM Foundation.

a.aria-label: Read more about Paramus Honored by NAMM Foundation

div.p: Inspired by similar efforts in Italy and Spain, our teachers invited everyone to express a community-wide display of optimism and encouragement.

a.aria-label: Read more about Andra Tutto Bene Rainbow Project

div.p: We strongly encourage you to check out the comprehensive website developed in response to the current public health emergency.

a.aria-label: Read more about Distance Learning Information Center

div.p: A kindergartener counted in the 2020 Census this spring will be starting high school when the next census comes around in 2030.
